features: GIVES LAUNDRY AN INSTANT SCENT MAKEOVER - Clorox Fraganzia is dedicated to a scent-sational laundry experience, infusing clothes with long-lasting fragrances.
OCEAN FRAGRANCE —The Ocean scent of this laundry detergent adds a light, crisp, beachy aroma to your laundry.
ENOUGH DETERGENT FOR ROUGHLY 26 LOADS – This 40oz bottle of laundry detergent will wash an estimated 26 loads of laundry when used as directed.
FOR ALL FRONT & TOP LOADERS – This detergent is HE compatible and safe to use for all front and top load washing machines.
LIQUID LAUNDRY DETERGENT – Clean your clothes with ease using your preferred amount of liquid laundry detergent in the scent-sational fragrances of Clorox Fraganzia!
body.description: Why shouldn't clean smell beautiful? Give your laundry an instant scent makeover with Clorox Fraganzia Liquid Detergent. Clorox Fraganzia is dedicated to a scent-sational laundry experience. The nature-inspired scents such as this laundry detergent in Ocean scent are incredibly long-lasting and exude freshness. Our easy-to-use detergents in pleasant scents clean and refresh your clothes with every load. Clorox Fraganzia Liquid Detergent keeps your laundry smelling great and cleaner than ever! This 40oz bottle of laundry detergent will wash an estimated 26 loads of laundry when used as directed. This detergent is HE compatible and safe to use for all front and top load washing machines. Clean your clothes with ease using an appropriate amount of liquid laundry detergent for your load size and instructions for your washer in the scent-sational fragrances of Fraganzia! Directions for use: For best results follow washing machine instructions for adding detergent. Shake closed Fraganzia bottle. Open bottle and measure to desired line in cap. For small loads fill to line 2. For large loads fill cap. Add into machine dispenser. To pretreat, apply a small amount directly to stain and rub into fabric. Allow to sit for 5 minutes before washing. Keep out of reach of children and pets. Love this scent? Check out our other laundry, dish, and air care products in our Ocean fragrance! The Clorox and Fraganzia names and logos are registered trademarks of The Clorox Company and are used under license by Brand Buzz CP. All rights reserved.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Clorox Fraganzia Laundry Solutions: Your Incentive To Get To That Towering Laundry Pile Knock Something Off Of Your To Do List Fewer wrinkles = less time spent ironing. Go ahead, take the dog out on that walk you promised, put the finishing touches on your favorite dish, or take on that e-mail inbox. No One Likes Clingy Laundry Who wants their laundry clinging to them? Fraganzia laundry solutions control static, preventing your clothes from sticking to you (and each other). Sweaty Clothes Have Met Their Toughest Opponent Your child finally brought home last season's sweaty hockey jersey. We give it one cycle until it smells like delicious lavender. Goal.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I like this detergent because one cupful makes a lot of suds.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Creo que es lo que necesito para que mi ropa al lavarla quede Bién con aroma ya fragancia que necesito.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 20, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Nice, not too strong scent, really like it. Cleans to my satisfaction, but I really don’t get too dirty.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewText: The price was good and it cleaned decently

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 26, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I didn't like this, there is no real scent to it. I was hoping for a soothing scent and it really has no scent at all. What a shame.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 7, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A Symphony of Scent in Every Wash
reviews.reviewText: I've been using this detergent and I am smitten by the scent. It's like being hit by a wave of freshness every time - it’s the ocean in a bottle! This scent lasts longer than any I've used before. It's a sensory joy that lingers even after the wash. It transforms laundry from a chore into a pleasure. I am eagerly looking forward to my next laundry day. This detergent will definitely be making a repeat appearance in my washing machine.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars NOT MADE IN U.S.A.
reviews.reviewText: I liked the fragrance, packaging, easy dispensing. I can't say it's cleaning any better than the other detergents I usually use Tide, Sam's Club Members Mark, or Costco's Kirkland brands. I like Clorox products for their reliability, but I am disappointed to learn that it is imported. It's unnecessary to transport laundry detergent across an ocean when we have manufacturers here.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 28, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Cleans great and leaves amazing scent.
